text: Gifted with hoofed feet and corrosive spit he uses to melt the faces of his foes from his mouth whilst carving them to shreds with twin swords.
Gifted with hoofed feet and corrosive spit he uses to melt the faces of his foes from his mouth whilst carving them to shreds with twin swords.
The Skraevold are a bloodthirsty tribe within Aesling territory known for their cannabilistic ways.
Not many Norscans are known to maintain alliances with Beastmen, yet the Aesling look upon them as equals.
Skraevold Marauders fight in the name of the Blood God's with sheer determination and unending fury.
Beastlike mutations are welcomed if not embraced by the warriors who have risen through the ranks of the Skraevold.
Like most Aesling tribes the Skraevold do not mind selling of kin to the highest bidder if it benefits them in any way.
Kolsveinn mutates with each boon recieved by Khorne, his transformation know his ritualistic ambition. Khorne's praise his only wish.
